A. Preamble 
Cumulative Bonus Plus (Group) is an add-on that can only be opted and shall only function along with 
an active HDFC ERGO Group health Base Product. This add-on cannot be opted in isolation or as a 
separate product.  
 
B. Operative Clause 
a. This Add-on can be opted without any additional premium only at inception or at the time 
renewal of Base Policy. 
b. All other general terms & conditions, exclusions, clauses, eligibility rules, and definitions 
applicable to the Base Product will apply to this add-on unless specifically stated otherwise in 
this document or on the Poli
